title: Diamond Floral Pendant: A Modern Mangalsutra Pendant
materials: G-H Color). Features a delicate Hyderabadi Polish for enhanced luster.
features: Features a row of diamond-studded floral motifs. The piece boasts a modern minimalist design, suitable for everyday wear while still retaining a touch of tradition. The delicate framework allows maximum light reflection, enhancing the brilliance of the diamonds.
colors: Rose Gold and Sparkling White Diamonds
description: A modern take on a traditional Indian design, this pendant offers unparalleled sparkle and elegance. Its delicate craftsmanship ensures both durability and comfort, making it a piece you can cherish for years to come. The use of high-quality diamonds adds to its inherent value and timeless appeal.
